Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory91.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: 'Good thing we rendezvoused in time. Quickly, escort the civilians to the safe zone. Everyone else, keep an eye on the bionics!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "Err' damn cannonslinger, get your asses over 'ere!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The base is in turmoil. One group of humans is engaging with the bionics approaching the base, while another is hastily preparing for the next wave of attacks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "...Ugh, I'm sorry. I don't feel so...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Simon, neither a Construct nor piloting a Polar Soldier, had no choice but to hitch a ride on Diana.'}
{3: 'Upon reaching the base, Simon could no longer hold his grip and tumbles off of Diana, rolling onto the ground.'}
{2: 'Are you okay?', 3: '11', 4: "Didn't you go through training in Babylonia?", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Phew... I-I just need a quick breather...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Argh... My physical training grades were just average... Ngh...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before he could finish, he signals for a open path and scurries behind the shade. By the look of things, he is likely going to be out of action for some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "Simon's always like this. I'll go look after him.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'The code! Did you guys find it?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Captain Staessen pushes his way from out of the crowd. Handing over the command to one of his subordinates, he begins to shake Atiel vigorously.'}
{2: 'Calm down!', 3: '17', 4: "Derek's voice is the code.", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'How can I calm down at a time like this? Do you know how dire the situation is? What on earth is the code to control Amberia?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's Derek. More specifically, it's his voice.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Derek... You mean that mechanic narwhal?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Wait... Why is that mechanical narwhal's voice the code? They're using a voice to control Amberia?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I can't tell what they were thinking either, but I'm afraid it's true. Derek's voice is specifically designed to resonate with the frequency of humanoid-hybrid M.I.N.D.s.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'How is that possible?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You must know what I mean, Commandant. You saw it firsthand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Our last time in the ARU...'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah. Derek's voice was the main reason I wasn't taken by the virus. I didn't realize at the time, but looking back, Derek may be the key to everything.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Now that you mention it, even though Derek swims all over the world, he always returns at a specific time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'The ebb and flow of the tide... You mean, that narwhal is the key to putting Amberia to rest?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Looks like it...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Where is Derek now?', 3: '28', 4: 'Will Derek be returning soon?', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: '...Who knows where that blasted narwhal is!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'He usually shows up at about this time, so he should have. We all assumed it was part of his migration cycle, but this time, Derek is running late.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'As a result...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Derek might be malfunctioning. The reason being...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'That must be it. Alpha had her eyes on Derek during her last visit, and in trying to "tame" him, she must have caused a system malfunction.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Then what do we do? No Derek, no code...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan has the code.', 3: '1017'}
{3: 'Diana suddenly recalls the last time she saw Evan.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory217.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: 'Supersonic Derek Wahoo!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory91.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "That's definitely Derek's voice.. Wait, where's Evan?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before you could react, Evan has already fallen to the ground. A familiar female Construct has snatched the voice player around his neck, radiating a terrifying smile on her face.'}
{2: '(Shoot grapple at her)', 3: '4000', 4: '(Charge at her)', 5: '5000'}
{3: 'You pilot the Polar Soldier to attack Atiel.'}
{3: "The grappling hook scratches Atiel's torso, causing vitual fluid to spray out."}
{3: 'You pilot the Polar Soldier to attack Atiel.'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Boss, you're way off mark.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Atiel dodges your charge, but Rosetta quickly follows with a throw of her spear.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The spear strikes Atiel, causing vital fluid to spray out.'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Cough... Dammit!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The terrain, however, makes the attack ineffectual, giving Atiel an opportunity to escape and run the other way.'}
{3: 'Rosetta activates her light wings and flies into the air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Catch her, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
